TextView.android:text: Gomoku+ (caro) is a two-player, board game. Each player has a type of stone, black or white. In each turn, each player places a stone at a corner in the board. The winner must have a line of first five adjacent stones vertically, horizontally, or diagonally. This line must not be blocked at both ends. A line of six of more adjacent stones does not count. Modes: 1. User Interaction  Two players take turns, place stones correctly at empty corners in the board. Players cannot place a new stone at a non-empty corner.  Stone existing on the board cannot be moved.  Players can select the size of the board before starting the game.  Players can see how long it takes at each turn.  Players can see when it is their turn. 2. Off-line Mode  Two players play taking turns on the same device. The program should display the turn of each player. 3. On-line Mode  Two players play taking turns, online, on the same board. 4. AI Mode  You play against the device.
